segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I feel a sense of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, but that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his sister standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be encouraging his risky behavior, which is not good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, and it looks like it could tip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the boy doesn't just ask for a cookie instead of risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's open palm shows her anticipation, but she's not helping the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that the children are being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, highlighting his precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me feel uneasy; someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
